title: Who Won E3 2021? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.15.21
description:
Blessing and Tim recap that Nintendo Direct, talk about who won E3 this year, and discuss Cyberpunk 2077 coming back to stores.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:30 - Housekeeping
In case you missed it there’s a bunch of E3 content to catch up on!:
The Kinda Funny Gamescast reaction to the Nintendo Direct is now live. It’s me, Tim, Janet Garcia, Barrett, Andy, and Greg all getting hyped about Mario Party Superstars and more.
ALSO PS I Love You XOXO featuring Janet Garcia is now live. We talk about what E3 means for PlayStation and we build our own PlayStation E3 Press Conference.
You can catch both of those on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.
Also remember you can catch our live reactions to all of the biggest E3 showcases uploaded on youtube right now.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Donavan Harkness & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:05 -  Nintendo’s Biggest E3 headlines - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:18:35 - Who won E3? - Best Friends Q:Anonymous
00:34:20 -  Ad
00:36:15 -  Cyberpunk 2077 is FINALLY coming back to the PlayStation Store - Adi Robertson @ The Verge
00:41:18 -  Rare’s Everwild has been completely rebooted - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:45:40 - Don’t expect Sports Story anytime soon.
00:50:11 - Out today
Reader mail   -
00:51:30 - Regarding E3 announcements, are company's damned if they do and dammed if they don't? - Derek Smith aka Canyoudigglet
00:58:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing & Andy
